Package org.example.Presentation

Class ProductController

java.lang.Object
org.example.Presentation.ProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class ProductController extends Object implements ActionListener
The ProductController class acts as the controller for product-related operations in the GUI. It implements ActionListener to handle user actions from the view.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    ProductController(ProductView view)
    Constructs a new ProductController object with the specified product view.

    • ProductController

      public ProductController(ProductView view)
      Constructs a new ProductController object with the specified product view. Initializes the ProductBLL for business logic operations.
      Parameters:
      view - The product view associated with this controller

      Parameters:

    • findById

      public void findById(int id)
      Finds a product by ID and displays the result in the view's result label.
      Parameters:

    • edit

      public void edit(int id, String name, BigDecimal price, int amount)
      Updates an existing product's information and displays the result in the view's result label.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the product to update
      name - The new name for the product
      price - The new price for the product
      amount - The new amount for the product

    • delete

      public void delete(int id)
      Deletes a product by ID and displays the result in the view's result label.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the product to delete

    • insert

      public void insert(String name, BigDecimal price, int amount)
      Inserts a new product with the specified name, price, and amount, displaying the result in the view's result label.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new product
      price - The price of the new product
      amount - The amount of the new product

    • findAll

      public JPanel findAll()
      Retrieves all products from the data source and displays them in a table within a JPanel.
      Returns:
      JPanel containing a JTable displaying all products
